name: Rogue Jones and the Hourglass of Time
name_original: Rogue Jones and the Hourglass of Time
description:
Oh no! After touching a magical artifact in the ancient temple of time our hero Rogue Jones is slowly turning to dust. He must escape the temple to break the curse and get out of this alive. The only problem is, that time is working against him.

Navigate the different levels of the perilous temple to escape. Don't worry, Rogue is a seasoned adventurer able to deal with all kinds of enemies. The only problem is, that everything he does costs him precious seconds. Increase your remaining time by collecting hourglasses throughout the temple, and don't forget to pick up keystones to open doors.

Controls

Control Rogue using the Arrow Keys or WASD.

Rogue Jones was developed in under 48 hours for the MiniBeansJam 7.

Credits

A game by - @AndideBob

With graphics by - ToastiChron

And music by - @DJBBone
